content: crochet this easy beginner blanket as a gift for someone you re grateful for for a new baby or as a gift to yourself or your family the simple double_crochet stich is perfect to show off a gradient or ombré yarn yarn bulky weight category 5 sizes baby/kids blanket size is 36 by 44 91 by 112 cm 962 yards 880 m for a baby/kids blanket adult throw blanket size is 46 by 70 117 by 179 cm shown across a king size bed 1 924 yards 1 760 m for an adult throw blanket find the tutorial video for this blanket on my pretty peaceful crochet channel on youtube https //youtu be/m1h5gl4hm0w share your project with #gratefulblanket on instagram tag @prettypeacefulcrochet too because i love to see your blankets please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern credit the design as grateful blanket crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern pdf instead please share your projects and the pattern link on youtube ravelry or etsy thank you for your support
